decision_conditions: The change of use to dance studio to which this permission relates shall be in operation for no longer than a 5 year period, when a further permission will be required.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):  Existing Elevations 23-19-b3-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0401 Rev B, Proposed Elevations 23-19-b3-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0402 Rev B,  Existing Plans 23-19-b3-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0201 Rev B, Proposed Plans 23-19-b3-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0202 Rev B, Existing Sections 23-19-b3-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0301 Rev B, Proposed Sections 23-19-b3-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0302 Rev B, Location Plan 23-19-b3-XX-XX-DR-A-0101, Proposed Block Plan 23-19-b3-XX-XX-DR-A-0102 Rev D, Planning Statement RENEW Planning July 2023, SLR Transport Statement 22 Dec 2023,  SLR Travel Plan 22 Dec 2023
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

| Cycle storage for ^IN;  bicycle spaces shall be provided within the curtilage of the development, within secure, lockable compounds in accordance with the designated locations identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2 and all adopted standards prior to the first occupation of the building. The storage spaces shall be permanently retained thereafter.
Reason:  To provide adequate bicycle storage in accordance with policy and T5 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Temporary change of use of premises from light-industrial processes (Use Class E(g)(iii)) to dance studio (Use Class E(d)) for a period of five years (Retrospective planning application)
